item.title: How to embed a Shiny app in blogdown
item.description: Photo by Ã‰mile Perron If you have developed and deployed a Shiny app and would like to embed it in blogdown, follow these steps: create a new post as usual add runtime: shiny (and output: html_document if it is not already included) in the YAML metadata insert the following HTML code in the body of the post: <iframe height="800" width="100%" frameborder="no" src="https://antoinesoetewey.shinyapps.io/statistics-201/"> </iframe> You should change the URL with the URL of your deployed Shiny app (after src=, do not forget that the URL should start with http:// or https:// and should be surrounded by "
